akn:subsection.akn:heading: Approval and disapproval of proposed plans

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Approval and disapproval of proposed plans

(c) Applicable laws Subject to section 5614 of this title, an Indian trust asset management plan, and any activity carried out under the plan, shall not be approved unless the proposed plan is consistent with any treaties, statutes, and Executive orders that are applicable to the trust assets, or the management of the trust assets, identified in the plan.
